doc.narrative_title: Test Narrative for FeatureSet Integration Test

cells.desc:
Test Narrative for FeatureSet Integration Test.
To reproduce:

remove add a markdown cell (this one!), remove the welcome cell
Import 2 genomes
in this case, I copied, from RefSeq refdata:

Acetobacter ascendens
Prochlorococcus marinus str. GP2

at the time of writing, the public data search for refseq is broken, so I copied into this narrative from their landing pages
create a FeatureSet for each Genome, using Build FeatureSet from Genome

choose the first 3 features from each genome for the feature set
name the feature set for Acetobacter "featureset1", for Prochlorococcus "featureset2"

create another FeatureSet combining these two using "Merge FeatureSets"
in the Description parameter add the text "merged feature set", or whatever text you like (it will need to match the integration test.)
in "Output FeatureSet Name" name it "mergedfeatureset"
insert the merged feature set object into the narrative as the last cell; it should be the 6th cell.
finally make the narrative public.

doc.creator: kbaseuitest
